name: Seize Halloween Knight
summary:
A Unique Strategy game with NEW FRESH Hallowmas Skin. Let's capture the Escaped Sleepy Hollow!
Not like your old puzzle and Strategy games, but even if there were. The ancient Sleepy Hollow gradually awaken, we need to use our wisdom to capture him with magic pumpkins. It is actually now or never for us! Move!
Otherwise, “Seize Halloween Knight” is one of the best-looking games of its genre which also runs smoothly on older devices. Endless and challenging capturing fun! Tons of Stunts to complete!
